aspectran.description: A simple example that prints "Hello, World!".

aspect.description: If a translet that executes the helloWorld method of the helloActivity bean is found, executes the welcome() method of the helloAdvice bean before executing the translet, and executes the goodbye() method of the helloAdvice bean after executing the translet.

translet.name: hello
translet.description: |Executes the method {{bold}}helloActivity.helloWorld(){{reset}} and prints the |returned value to the console. |It probably prints "Hello, World!" to the console. Hard to find |on console? If so, try running the {{GREEN}}hello2{{reset}} command.

translet.name: hello2
translet.description: |Executes the method {{bold}}helloActivity.helloWorld(){{reset}} and prints the |returned value to the console using ANSI coloring. |It probably prints "Hello, World!" inside a colored box.
